CustomField.description: Determines if a student currently counts as a positive outcome and is employed full-time in a job related to Year Up curriculum. Returns a 1 if criteria is met and a 0 if otherwise.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines if a student currently counts as a positive outcome and is employed full-time in a job related to Year Up curriculum. Returns a 1 if criteria is met and a 0 if otherwise.
CustomField.label: Positive Outcome YU-Related FT Job?
